Reviews.Title: “Great location”

Reviews.Content: tucked location lift gym arrive pack light lots lots eat close train station arrive airport train walk job clean deal breakfast simple friendly staff speak english afternoon evening questions approach stayed tight budget couldnt afford extra 10euro aircon hottest night offered aircon free dude

Reviews.Content: start aware hotel located sketchy town near termini train station considering booking hotel probably lobby located floor hotel friend booked supposed twin beds entered queen bed looked twin size bed windows looked rundown apartment complex recommend blinds building night loud speak living building morning hear move outside shower drain sometimes flooded tends europe internet available internet cafe block front desk pretty helpful hotel overall location terms proximity metro station coliseum staff hotel allowed bags hotel sightseeing flight wasnt unti 9 pm front desk feel safe leaving periods time hotel nice feel hotels offer amentities hotel amount paid

Reviews.Title: “Good location; bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: Estrella91
Reviews.Content: hotel doubt worst stayed im people makes hotels middle day told wed wait hours ready travelling 30 school trip split 10 incredibly dirty fridge safety deposit box didnt pay air conditioning paid shower door bathroom broken wasnt fixed kept door shower friends bottom floor window maid kept leaving gotten luckily happened staying bb breakfast food terrible rolls jam bad fruit cereal toaster rome amazing location hotel fab walking main attractions probably bus vatican thats bit bus service beware pickpockets streets hassling buy fake rome hotel
